description: Mechanical verification registry for documented issues. Source of truth for bug existence proof.

issues.summary: KS22 vector search _rid prefix (vec_mem/vec_ep) differs from keyword (mem) and FTS (fts); same memory can appear as duplicates across strategies
KS22 FTS5 query sanitization only removes quotes; FTS5 operators (AND/OR/NOT/NEAR) and special characters can cause injection
MCP servers use stderr print/logging which conflicts with MCP stdio transport on stderr â€” FALSE POSITIVE: logging to stderr is MCP-safe (stdio uses stdin/stdout only)
Dead shutdown field in McpClientManager â€” stored but never read
ServerStatus::Error serializes as object instead of string â€” frontend type mismatch
McpClient lacks Drop impl â€” response loop task leaked on disconnect
handleAction calls async fn synchronously â€” Promise not awaited
disconnect_server TOCTOU â€” servers and tool_index locked separately
Server name input allows arbitrary strings â€” no format validation
Tool name collision silently overwrites routing index
load_config_file returns Ok even when all servers fail â€” no summary log
useEffect missing loadSettings in dependency array

Log entries use array index as React key â€” causes reconciliation issues

Gaze engine is_running property not protected by lock â€” data race on bool read
